dialogs.responseText: One the one hand, I am a scout, and I can find monsters for you to fight. On the other hand, I have a keen eye, and can choose the specific creatures you'd prefer to battle with.
I would work for any great adventurer, tying my legacy to theirs. But one must prove their worth before I simply follow blindly.

dialogs.buttonText: How do I prove I am worthy?
dialogs.responseText: Give me 10,000 dojo tokens. Only a great warrior would be capable of both acquiring so many and casually giving them away.
I am overjoyed to work for one such as yourself. Let me guide you, then, to whatever beasts you wish to slay.
Few adventurers ever will. To complete the dojo circuits many times is a difficult task. If you grow in your abilities and your limitations restrict your answer no more, please come see me again.
